code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BugItem=_ref=>{let{bug,toggleResolve,deleteBug}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bug-item ".concat(bug.resolved?'resolved':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:bug.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:bug.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleResolve(bug.id),children:bug.resolved?'Reopen':'Resolve'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteBug(bug.id),className:"delete-button",children:"Delete"})]})]});};export default BugItem;
